name: Tragedy of TV(TOT)
description:
Beware of the March 10th, the ides.

The outside world has died.

We inside stand side by side to fortify our civic pride.

The great divide left us unsatisfied,

Petrified of the multiplied nationwide infanticide.

The Justified Override achieved statewide

Safety.

This concludes your holiday. Go to your dwellings, turn on the telly, and drift off into oblivion. 10 minutes to curfew.

It's a lie.

The state's dirty, classified underside has us mummified.

We… have died.

----------------------

국민이 주권자임을 자각하자!

깨어있는 시민 하나둘 모여서 불합리한 체제를 타도하고

나아가, 불합리가 우리를 억압하지 못하게 하고 부패가 민중를 수탈하지 못하도록 하는 세상.

오직 민중이 민중을 위하여 일체 불합리,독재,부패된 자로부터 타파함으로써 민중을 각오케 하는 유일한 방법이다.

----------------------

国民が主権者であることを自覚しましょう！

目を覚ましている市民一人二人集まって不合理な体制を打倒し、

さらに、不合理が私たちを抑圧しないようにして腐敗がミンジュンルル収奪しないようにする世界。

唯一の民衆が民衆のために一体不合理、独裁、腐敗した者から打破することで、民衆を覚悟させる唯一の方法である。

----------------------

Let's be aware that the people are sovereign!



One awake citizen is gathered to overthrow the irrational system



Furthermore, a world that prevents irrationality from oppressing us and corruption from taking over the people.



Only the people are the only way to defeat the oppressor from all irrational, dictatorship, and Democratic corruption.

Team Hobo

호떡 and 보드카

Special Thanks to

Issac Colson, heesu Kim, Hyesu Lee

RED studio (youtu.be/anEAflc1mnY)
